  <h3>Women's March Madness</h3>
  <p>
<strong>Description</strong>: This data set tracks every NCAA Division I Women’s Basketball Tournament appearance since 1982 up until 2018. It includes team seeds, results, bid types, season and conference records, and regional placements. Useful for analyzing team success, seeding impact, conference strength, and historical trends in women’s college basketball over four decades.
</p>
